attributes.action: stop London & South Eastern Railway Ltd from cancelling the fast train service between Cannons Street and Ashford International
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
From December 2009 Southeastern trains will remove all the fast trains between Cannons Street and Ashford International. This means that prime commuting stations like Maidstone and West Malling / King's Hill will lose all their fast services, which currently run into London Bridge or Cannons Street. 

If we don't stop this Southeastern will continue to erode our train service until only the most highly profitable trains are left. This will only mean extreme overcrowding on the remaining trains and will eventually marginalise  Maidstone and King's Hill rendering them irrelevant.  

Support Maidstone and West Malling - they needs more fast trains, not less.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "stop London & South Eastern Railway Ltd from cancelling the fast train service between Cannons Street and Ashford International."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20353


Prime Minister's Office
